description: The Steam Coast Trail is a series of shared cycling and walking trails around the Somerset coast near Dunster. The section shown below is Phase 1, running from Dunster Beach to Blue Anchor . You'll pass along a safe surfaced path running along the West Somerset Railway line. Along the way there's fine views of Dunster Beach with its nature reserve and wildlife. It's a nice easy ride for families to try. Please click here to see the Steam Coast Trail Phase 2 running from Old Cleeve to Washford.
